Services

Ironwork that elevates your property

From custom fabrication to on-site repairs, we build strong, clean, and consistent metalwork.

Iron Fences

Durable, tailored fences that balance security with curb appeal.

  • Perimeter fencing
  • Decorative pickets

Custom Gates

Manual or automated gates built for smooth operation and strength.

  • Driveway gates
  • Side yard gates

View Gallery

Railings & Handrails

Safe, code-aligned rails for stairs, balconies, and walkways.

  • Interior stair rails
  • Balcony railings
  • ADA-compliant handrails
View Gallery

Window Bars & Security

Low-profile security solutions that protect without blocking views.

  • Window guards
  • Security grilles
  • Custom security panels
View Gallery

Repairs

On-site fixes for damaged, rusted, or misaligned metalwork.

  • Gate hinge repair
  • Fence section replacement
  • Weld reinforcement
View Gallery

Why Metal Magic

Craftsmanship you can count on

Every project is measured, welded, and finished with precision.

  • Fabrication-first approach for stronger, cleaner installs
  • On-time scheduling with clear jobsite communication
  • Precision welding and finishing for long-term durability
  • Local, hands-on craftsmanship with safety in mind
